description:
Sister of Takeya, who was the only person kind to her. Although a kind person at heart, having saved Kazuma from bullying ten years ago, Misao blames Kazuma for her brother`s death and attempts to kill him. Her attempts fail, and she becomes a pawn in Michael`s plan to take Kazuma down. In the end, Kazuma convinces her to atone for her sins by living on, and she is later instructed by Juugo to retire to a convent.
Source: wiki
name: Oogami Misao
